verses.text: O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
Have mercy upon me, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; for I amweak: O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, how long?
Return, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy merciesâ€™ sake.
For in death there isno remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?
I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
Mine eye is consumed because of grief; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies.
Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*hath heard the voice of my weeping.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*hath heard my supplication; the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*will receive my prayer.
Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return andbe ashamed suddenly.
